title: About us
text: We capture investment opportunities in a professional and creative way. We manage investments applied to real estate developments ensuring results and providing confidence to our clients. We develope, you Dwell.

team.name: Ing. Francisco Olaizola
team.text:
Civil engineer graduated from the University of Montevideo, with a degree from the University of Pittsburgh, USA.

Extensive experience in construction and development projects.

Co-founder of Dwell Developers, dedicated to attract and manage investments inthe real estate sector.

team.name: Ing. Elbio Olaizola
team.text:
Businessman and Director of companies linked to the Engineering and Construction area. Some of the main projects under his management:

- Uruguay International Airport
- Executive Tower of the Presidency of Uruguay
- Corporate Buildings: World Trade Center IV of Montevideo
- Shopping Nuevocentro in Montevideo

He has vast experience in the Uruguayan real estate market. He has participated in important projects such as Fideicomiso Torres Nuevocentro, Oxo Parques and Zen Pueblo Jard√≠n
